## MAGIC HEARSE REDUX
## No More DeathWaves! Are you managing a large city that is overrun with hearses and those annoying hearse notifications? This mod removes death in your cities. No death = no crematoriums, cemetaries, or hearses cloggin up the roads.
Citizens will magically disappear upon death.
## How it works: Works automatically - just install the mod and enable the checkbox in Options. - Silent operation: enable/disable without restarting your game. - Does not use Harmony or Reflection (increases reliability on game patch days). - Works with new and existing saves. - Safe to remove any time
## What is the Secret Sauce? - Selection: scans citizen entities with both flags dead and requires transport and safely vanishes them. - Performance: designed to update less frequently with parallel jobs.
## Outcomes: Hearse drivers out of job seek employment in the shipping industry.
## Added Languages: French, Spanish, German, Simple Chinese
